pr_title: HDDS-3086. Failure running integration test it-freon.

timeline.message: HDDS-3086. Failure running integration test it-freon.

timeline.bodyText: Can we make these configs to be the default, somewhere around MiniOzoneCluster?  Eg. let Builder.build() add them if they are not explicitly set.  I hope that would let us avoid repeating them for all integration tests.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: yes, i think we can do that..But we need to ensure all other tests work with this config
replies.author: bshashikant
